activities: We send a large volume of Email Invitations and Email Reminders to encourage individuals to participate in our online research studies.  These research studies are primarily Employee Surveys and Customer Surveys that we have been retained to conduct by our clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization Names, Client Names, Telephone Numbers, and Email Addresses.  There is no manually processed data.
